trans-unit.source: The value type with the indexer.
Represents an element referenced by an indexer on a value type that can be used as an l-value in an expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示由值类型上的索引器引用的一个元素，该元素可用作表达式中的左值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ValueTypeIndexerReference%602> in an `Assign` activity to assign a `string` value to the `struct` element at index 1 and prints the element value to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例在 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ValueTypeIndexerReference%602> 活动中使用 `Assign` 将 `string` 分配给位于索引 1 处的 `struct` 元素，并将元素值打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: The `Assign` activity is equivalent to the following statement when using the `struct` defined in the following example: `myStructVariable[1] = "Hello";`.
trans-unit.target: `Assign` 活动相当于使用以下示例中定义的 `struct` 时的如下语句：`myStructVariable[1] = "Hello";`。

trans-unit.source: Instead of instantiating the <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ValueTypeIndexerReference%602> l-value expression activity directly, it is strongly recommended that you call <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices.ConvertReference%2A>, which provides a higher level of abstraction and enables you to implement your workflow more intuitively.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议您调用提供更高抽象级别并使您能够更直观地实现工作流的 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ValueTypeIndexerReference%602>，而不是直接实例化 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices.ConvertReference%2A> 左值表达式活动。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.ValueTypeIndexerReference`2" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.ValueTypeIndexerReference`2" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of arguments that represent the indices of the element in the indexer array.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个参数集合，这些参数表示元素在索引器数组中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The indices of the element in the indexer array.
trans-unit.target: 元素在索引器数组中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ValueTypeIndexerReference%602.Indices%2A> property is read-only, but the items in the collection can be modified and the indices can be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ValueTypeIndexerReference%602.Indices%2A> 属性为只读，但可以修改集合中的项，并可以更改索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instance of the value type that contains the indexer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含索引器的值类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: The instance of the value type that contains the indexer.
trans-unit.target: 包含索引器的值类型的实例。
